Namespace Budget

Classes

BudgetItem

Represents a BudgetItem with the information about the Category and the Expense.

BudgetItemsByCategory

Represents a list of BudgetItem with the same Category.

BudgetItemsByMonth

Represents a list of BudgetItem in the same current Month.

Categories

Represents a list of Category items.

Category

Represents a Category item.

Database

Represents the Database, providing the connection between the database and the models.

Expense

Represents an Expense item.

Expenses

Represents a collection of Expense items.

HomeBudget

Represents the HomeBudget, including a list of Categories and a list of Expenses.

Enums

Category.CategoryType

Describes the type of the Category.
